mixk.evaluation.evaluator_mixk.build(cfg, registry, default_args=None)[source]

Build a object.

Parameters

  • cfg (dict, list[dict]) – The config of modules, is is either a dict or a list of configs.

  • registry (Registry) – A registry the module belongs to.

  • default_args (dict, optional) – Default arguments to build the module. Defaults to None.

Returns

obj
